officialTitle: The Effectiveness of Nasal Corticosteroids Versus Placebo in Nasal Obstruction in Patients With Nasal Septal Deviation
inclusionCriteria:
* Age greater than 18
* NOSE score greater than 55
* Nasal septal deviation on exam
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 100 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Intranasal steroid use within the last three months
* Current systemic steroid use
* Prior septal surgery
* Individuals who are pregnant or actively breastfeeding
